name: cities_v2_get_measurements
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airvisual.
Tool description: Query for Air Pollution Data, Weather information, Health Recommendations, etc... as on the official application
API description: Fetches air quality and weather measurements for a specified city using its ID.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the city, as returned in the /v2/auto-complete endpoint.

x_units_distance.description: Unit of measurement for distance. One of 'miles' or 'kilometer'. Defaults to 'kilometer'.

x_units_pressure.description: Unit of measurement for pressure. One of 'hg' or 'mbar'. Defaults to 'mbar'.

x_aqi_index.description: Air Quality Index standard to use. One of 'us' or 'cn'. Defaults to 'us'.

x_units_temperature.description: Unit of measurement for temperature. One of 'fahrenheit' or 'celsius'. Defaults to 'celsius'.

x_user_timezone.description: Timezone to use for the user. Defaults to 'Asia/Singapore'.
